name: Pirobot (KyuuTano, UnderWander)
description:
Pirobot is a top-down action game built in Unreal Engine 4! Play as R0-Y, a firefighting automaton, to put out fires!

Controls

Keyboard and Mouse

W, A, S, D - to Move

Mouse - Aim your shot

Left Mouse Button- Fire your Water Launcher

Credits

Connie Torres - Producer/Designer, Narrative Designer, Itch-Page Creator, Video Editor, Sound Designer

Evan Johnson - Level Designer, UI Designer, Assistant Programmer

Dmangames (Steven Zhang) - 3D Artist

Spencer Gellner - Programmer

Li Baum - Programmer/Designer. Sound Designer

Made for Seattle Indies Global Game Jam!

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/pirobot-9
